title: Robot Monster Vocalizations Vol. 4
description: A collection of robot monster vocalizations, contains 216 sound effects, including battle, pain and neutral vocalizations, ready for mutant and alien creation.
longDescription:
Audio Preview: https://soundcloud.com/magic-sound-effects/sets/robot-monster-vocalizations-vol-4

Sound List: https://www.dropbox.com/s/v4ozifzi472jnr9/MSE%20-%20Robot%20Monster%20Vocalizations%20Vol.%204_v1.0.pdf?dl=0


The collection contains 18 voice actions, including 216 professionally designed vocalization one-shot sound effects, divided into:

  • 20 attacks
  • 16 battle shouts
  • 4 sounds of breath
  • 4 coughs
  • 20 deaths
  • 8 exerts and efforts
  • 8 groans
  • 20 growls
  • 8 idle sounds
  • 16 jumps and actions
  • 8 laughs
  • 20 pains
  • 20 roars
  • 4 sad and upset sounds
  • 8 snarling sounds
  • 12 snorting and grunting sounds
  • 4 sounds of tiredness
  • 16 victory shouts


Such a variety of vocal samples can satisfy a wide variety of needs.Â 


The vocalizations are perfect for voicing robot characters as well as enemy characters and bosses. These sound effects can also be used for mutant and alien voices. All voice samples are created in a dark style.


Using this asset, create an atmosphere for your project in the genre of fantasy, dark fantasy, post-apocalyptic, sci-fi, horror or any other where monsters live and roar.


For support and other questions, please send an email to: magic.sound.effects@gmail.com.
technicalDetails:
Features:

  • 216 game-ready sound effects
  • 44.1 khz, 16 bit, wav, stereo
  • 18 voice actions
  • 100 voice samples of the attacking type
  • 52 voice samples of the pain type
  • 64 neutral type voice samples
  • great for game scenes, animations and trailers


Number of Audio Waves: 216

Number of Audio Cues: 216

Sample rate / bit rate: 44,100 Hz / 16 Bit

Do Sound FX loop: No

Minutes of audio provided: 07 minutes 37 seconds

Supported Development Platforms:

  • Windows: Yes
  • Mac: Yes
